attributes.action: Recognise the fact that ordinary people should be rewarded with National Honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise the fact that ordinary people should be rewarded with National Honours and the system changed. There are many worthy causes that are overlooked by the Cabinet Office and as always many sports stars, pop stars, actors and the like are rewarded in place of the true ' National Heros' without of which the coutry would worse off.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
